creditline: Gift of Dr. Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: twenty-three panels total; thirteen long panels sewn along long edges, with extending panels on eight long panels to create even length; grey and black woven panels with light purple-pinkish shiny embroidery on one side; folded and sewn hems at short edges; embroidered pattern of horizontal stripes across panels; bands of horizontally or vertically oriented embroidered diamonds
title: Wrapper
